content: the side assembly a few inches up from the bottom hem sleeves optional note the sample in the photographs does not have the optional sleeves nor are they included in the projected yardage for the project row 1 turn tunic right-side out with ws of arm hole facing you sl-st to join yarn to a double_crochet near the seam chain-3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet around sl-st to top of chain- 3 to join turn © 2016 right brain crochet right brain crochet@gmail com right brain crochet 6 row 2 chain-3 counts as double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet v-st in next double_crochet around double_crochet in same st as beginning chain-3 single_crochet in top of chain-3 counts as chain-1 turn row 3 chain-3 counts as double_crochet v-st in chain-1 space of next v-st around double_crochet in same st as beginning chain-3 chain-1 sl-st to top of beginning chain-3 to join turn row 4 chain-3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet and in each chain around sl-st to top of beginning chain-3 to join turn row 5 chain-3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around sl-st to beginning chain-3 to join fasten_off or for a longer sleeve continue working repeats of row 2-5 until sleeves reached desired length thank you for downloading my pattern please feel free to use items made from this pattern for personal use gifts local craft shows or charity fundraising permission to sell items made from this pattern in retail or online must be granted by the designer this pattern is not for reproduction or resale if you have any questions about fair usage of this pattern or questions about the directions please contact me at right brain crochet@gmail com thanks jennifer ӧzses © 2016 right brain crochet right brain crochet@gmail com
